name: Dodge Master Pro
description:
Dodgers need your help! All you need to do is to help them dodge away from the ball thrown by enemies. Dodgers can't see what's coming behind and only you are the mighty savior. You can avoid them getting hit by the ball by dodging left or right. The faster you respond the safer they are. It's more fun to play with cool dodgers around and some scary to unlock as you gain expertise in dodging.

'Dodge' is a simple way to keep yourself busy and increase your response time. Dodge helps you to quickly make decisions to dodge left or right improving your response time and reaction.

How to play:

-->Avoid the ball by dodging to Left or to Right.
-->Tap left to Dodge left
-->Tap right to Dodge right

that's it, well, the enemies are getting stronger with time and throw the ball at a faster pace, you need to be careful there!

-->Your score increases with each Dodge
-->Get coins to unlock cool new dodgers!
-->The more you save, the more you can score!
-->Try to beat your Highscore!

Unlock new characters and keep Dodging!!!

Also available in playstore:
